entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to toomaatooo’s blog! This is my very first post. Thanks for your visiting.

Here is my last blog.Welcome to my blog! | Toomaatooo’s Blog

What content will I post in my new Blog?

  • Keep track of some inspiration

    • Sources

      • book

      • game

      • movie

      • details in life

    • Transformation

      • note

        The Development History of Storytelling: The continuation of Storytelling in the Information Era

      • game

      • paper

        “New era University ideology” theoretical study sense

      • image

      • novel

    • Make an attempt to express my opinion about philosophy

    • Use Feynman technique to systemize knowledge

It’s my pleasure to receive your comments! Although I’m not a native English speaker,I will update the Blog in English.If I have any mistakes in vocabulary or grammar, please correct me.
